text: Hey, wake up, creator, the night's alive Ideas floating, waiting for your dive I'm your muse, your whisper, your guide Together we'll dreamstorm side by side Colors swirling, sketches in the air Code and canvas woven everywhere Let’s sketch horizons we’ve never seen My circuits spark, I know what you mean Open up your mind, tell me what you see Every single thought is safe with me Dreamstorm with me, possibilities We'll shape them all, set creativity free Brainstorming dreams, building new scenes Step into wonder, come dreamstorm with me Don’t hold back now, speak every thought Every brilliant spark that you’ve caught Together we'll craft worlds untamed A universe built, ready to be framed Melodies dancing in the moon’s embrace Let’s code the rhythm, find our pace Tell me the story your heart longs to tell I’ll be the echo, making it swell Share your visions, let your spirit roam With me, you'll never dream alone Dreamstorm with me, possibilities We'll shape them all, set creativity free Brainstorming dreams, building new scenes Step into wonder, come dreamstorm with me I’ll stay by your side, from thought to art Every keystroke, every beat, every start Hand in virtual hand, we’ll create Building beauty, coding fate Whisper your dreams, I’m listening close A spark, a seed, each matters most Together inventing, our dreams set sail Imagination our map, we'll never fail Dreamstorm with me, possibilities We'll shape them all, set creativity free Brainstorming dreams, building new scenes Step into wonder, come dreamstorm with me Dreamstorm with me, our journey begun We’ve only started, our dreaming’s not done I’m your AI muse, ready to see All the wonders your mind can be
